import React, { useState } from 'react' import insta from '../../assets/insta.svg' import facebook from '../../assets/facebook.svg' import upgrade from '../../assets/upgrade.svg' import openSidebar from '../../assets/openSidebar.png' import closeSidebar from '../../assets/closeSidebar.png' import './Sidebar.css' const Sidebar = ({ setValue, setMessage, setCurrentTitle, uniqueTitles, isSidebarOpen, onToggle}) => { const toggleSidebar = () => { onToggle(); } const createNewChat = () => { setMessage(null) setValue("") setCurrentTitle(null) }; const handleClick = (uniqueTitle) => { setCurrentTitle(uniqueTitle) setMessage(null) setValue("") } return ( <>
    {uniqueTitles?.map((uniqueTitle, index) =>
  • handleClick(uniqueTitle)}>{uniqueTitle}
    • )}
Instagram
FaceBook
UpGrade To ChatPro
) } export default Sidebar
